title-group.article-title: Applying D Sight Technology to Aging Aircraft Corrosion NDI

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1996 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: The problem of early detection of sub surface Lap Joint corrosion in the fuselage section of aircraft is critical to the continued air worthiness of aging aircraft. The large area of lap joint to be inspected requires a high speed system of measurement. D Sight is an enhanced visual technique that allows rapid inspection and early detection of lap joint corrosion. With the presence of inter-layer corrosion, a very distinctive surface budge or pillowing occurs between the lap joint rivets. D Sight imaging technology magnifies surface curvature changes to the exterior skin of the aircraft making them readily apparent. Extremely low levels of corrosion can be detected below the surface as the oxidized material distorts the lap joint and creates shape changes on the outermost skin. The D Sight sensitivity to local curvature change amplifies the effect dramatically and instantaneously. Stored D Sight images, compared with current images can readily determine a change in a specific area of an aircraft, while constantly updating maintenance records.

ref.mixed-citation: Reynolds, R .L, Hageniers, O. L., "A Rigorous Optical Theory of the D SIGHT Phenomenon", Proc. SPIE 1332, pp. 85-96, 1990.
Prior, T. R., Reynolds, R. L., Pastorius, W., "D SIGHT: A Whole -field Optical Technique for Determination of Surface Form Deviation", Surface Topography, April 1988.
Reynolds, R. L., Karpala, F., Clarke, D., Hageniers, O., "Theory and Applications of a Surface Inspection Technique Using Double Pass Retroreflection", Optical Engineering, 32(9), Sept. 1993.

Hageniers, O. L., " DAIS Applications, D Sight Aircraft Inspection System for Corroson Inspection", Technical Report, Characterization of Corrosion and Development of a Breadboard Model of a D Sight Aircraft Inspection System - Phase I, p G-10, August 1994.

Hageniers, O. L., " DAIS Applications, D Sight Aircraft Inspection System for Corroson Inspection", Technical Report, Characterization of Corrosion and Development of a Breadboard Model of a D Sight Aircraft Inspection System - Phase I, pp G-12 - G-23.
